name: Bullet Rewind
description:
This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2.
You can donload my game using this link: https://mega.nz/folder/KbxVED7Y#JrUf70CidU6R2ckGKUej3w

I uploaded the game, but the files were corrupted and it didn’t worked and because of the jam rules i wasn’t able to reupload the game, but now i gave a link in the description, so if you wanted to play the game you can now play it.
